events.description: Yandy Diaz lines out sharply to center fielder Kevin Kiermaier. 1 out
Brandon Lowe strikes out swinging. 2 outs

George Springer homers (3) on a line drive to left center field.

Daulton Varsho steals (3) 2nd base.
Matt Chapman walks.
Brandon Belt grounds into a double play, second baseman Brandon Lowe to shortstop Wander Franco to first baseman Yandy Diaz. Matt Chapman out at 2nd. Brandon Belt out at 1st. 3 outs
